00175             template<template<size_t> class ValueType>
00176             class MemoryCell {
00177             protected:
00178                 ValueType<32> address;                      
00179                 ValueType<32> data;                         
00180                 size_t nbytes;                              
00181                 bool clobbered;                             
00183                 bool written;                               
00186             public:
00189                 template <size_t Len>
00190                 MemoryCell(const ValueType<32> &address, const ValueType<Len> &data, size_t nbytes)
00191                     : address(address), data(data), nbytes(nbytes), clobbered(false), written(false) {}
00192 
00195                 const ValueType<32>& get_address() const { return address; }
00196                 ValueType<32>& get_address() { return address; }
00197                 void set_address(const ValueType<32> &addr) { address=addr; }
00202                 const ValueType<32>& get_data() const { return data; }
00203                 ValueType<32>& get_data() { return data; }
00204                 void set_data(const ValueType<32> &d) { data=d; }
00208                 size_t get_nbytes() const { return nbytes; }
00209                 void set_nbytes(size_t n) { nbytes=n; }
00215                 bool is_clobbered() const { return clobbered; }
00216                 void set_clobbered(bool b=true) { clobbered=b; }
00217                 void clear_clobbered() { clobbered=false; }
00225                 bool is_written() const { return written; }
00226                 void set_written(bool b=true) { written=b; }
00227                 void clear_written() { written=false; }
00235                 template<typename PrintHelper>
00236                 void print(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00237                     o <<prefix <<"address = { ";
00238                     address.print(o, ph);
00239                     o <<" }\n";
00240 
00241                     o <<prefix <<"  value = { ";
00242                     data.print(o, ph);
00243                     o <<" }\n";
00244 
00245                     o <<prefix <<"  flags = { size=" <<nbytes;
00246                     if (!written) o <<"; read-only";
00247                     if (clobbered) o <<"; clobbered";
00248                     o <<" }\n";
00249                 }
00250 
00253                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, const MemoryCell &mc) {
00254                     mc.print<SEMANTIC_NO_PRINT_HELPER>(o);
00255                     return o;
00256                 }
00257 
00258             };

00260             /******************************************************************************************************************
00261              *                                  RegisterStateX86

00265             template <template <size_t> class ValueType>
00266             class RegisterStateX86 {
00267             public:
00268                 static const size_t n_gprs = 8;             
00269                 static const size_t n_segregs = 6;          
00270                 static const size_t n_flags = 32;           
00272                 ValueType<32> ip;                           
00273                 ValueType<32> gpr[n_gprs];                  
00274                 ValueType<16> segreg[n_segregs];            
00275                 ValueType<1> flag[n_flags];                 
00277                 void clear() {
00278                     ip = ValueType<32>();
00279                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i)
00280                         gpr[i] = ValueType<32>();
00281                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i)
00282                         segreg[i] = ValueType<16>();
00283                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i)
00284                         flag[i] = ValueType<1>();
00285                 }
00286 
00287                 void zero() {
00288                     static const uint64_t z = 0;
00289                     ip = ValueType<32>(z);
00290                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i)
00291                         gpr[i] = ValueType<32>(z);
00292                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i)
00293                         segreg[i] = ValueType<16>(z);
00294                     for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i)
00295                         flag[i] = ValueType<1>(z);
00296                 }
00297 
00301                 template<typename PrintHelper>
00302                 void print(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00303                     std::ios_base::fmtflags orig_flags = o.flags();
00304                     try {
00305                         for (size_t i=0; i<n_gprs; ++i) {
00306                             o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<gprToString((X86GeneralPurposeRegister)i) <<" = { ";
00307                             gpr[i].print(o, ph);
00308                             o <<" }\n";
00309                         }
00310                         for (size_t i=0; i<n_segregs; ++i) {
00311                             o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<segregToString((X86SegmentRegister)i) <<" = { ";
00312                             segreg[i].print(o, ph);
00313                             o <<" }\n";
00314                         }
00315                         for (size_t i=0; i<n_flags; ++i) {
00316                             o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<flagToString((X86Flag)i) <<" = { ";
00317                             flag[i].print(o, ph);
00318                             o <<" }\n";
00319                         }
00320                         o <<prefix <<std::setw(7) <<std::left <<"ip" <<" = { ";
00321                         ip.print(o, ph);
00322                         o <<" }\n";
00323                     } catch (...) {
00324                         o.flags(orig_flags);
00325                         throw;
00326                     }
00327                     o.flags(orig_flags);
00328                 }
00329             };

00341             template<
00342                 template <template <size_t> class ValueType> class MemoryCell,
00343                 template <size_t> class ValueType>
00344             class StateX86 {
00345             public:
00346                 RegisterStateX86<ValueType> registers;
00347                 typedef std::list<MemoryCell<ValueType> > Memory;
00348                 Memory memory;
00349 
00352                 void clear() {
00353                     registers.clear();
00354                     clear_memory();
00355                 }
00356 
00359                 void zero_registers() {
00360                     registers.zero();
00361                 }
00362 
00364                 void clear_memory() {
00365                     memory.clear();
00366                 }
00367 
00371                 template<typename PrintHelper>
00372                 void print_registers(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00373                     registers.print(o, prefix, ph);
00374                 }
00375 
00379                 template<typename PrintHelper>
00380                 void print_memory(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00381                     std::ios_base::fmtflags orig_flags = o.flags();
00382                     try {
00383                         for (typename Memory::const_iterator mi=memory.begin(); mi!=memory.end(); ++mi)
00384                             mi->print(o, prefix, ph);
00385                     } catch (...) {
00386                         o.flags(orig_flags);
00387                         throw;
00388                     }
00389                     o.flags(orig_flags);
00390                 }
00391 
00395                 template<typename PrintHelper>
00396                 void print(std::ostream &o, const std::string prefix="", PrintHelper *ph=NULL) const {
00397                     o <<prefix <<"registers:\n";
00398                     print_registers(o, prefix+"    ", ph);
00399                     o <<prefix <<"memory:\n";
00400                     print_memory(o, prefix+"    ", ph);
00401                 }
00402 
00405                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, const StateX86 &state) {
00406                     state.print<SEMANTIC_NO_PRINT_HELPER>(o);
00407                     return o;
00408                 }
00409             };

00420             class Policy {
00421             protected:
00422                 const RegisterDictionary *regdict;                  
00424             public:
00425                 Policy(): regdict(NULL) {}
00426 
00428                 struct Exception {
00429                     Exception(const std::string &mesg): mesg(mesg) {}
00430                     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &o, const Exception &e) {
00431                         o <<"semantics exception: " <<e.mesg;
00432                         return o;
00433                     }
00434                     std::string mesg;
00435                 };
00436 
00448                 const RegisterDictionary *get_register_dictionary() const {
00449                     return regdict;
00450                 }
00451                 void set_register_dictionary(const RegisterDictionary *regdict) {
00452                     this->regdict = regdict;
00453                 }
00459                 const RegisterDescriptor& findRegister(const std::string &regname, size_t nbits=0) {
00460                     const RegisterDictionary *regdict = get_register_dictionary();
00461                     if (!regdict)
00462                         throw Exception("no register dictionary");
00463 
00464                     const RegisterDescriptor *reg = regdict->lookup(regname);
00465                     if (!reg) {
00466                         std::ostringstream ss;
00467                         ss <<"Invalid register: \"" <<regname <<"\"";
00468                         throw Exception(ss.str());
00469                     }
00470 
00471                     if (nbits>0 && reg->get_nbits()!=nbits) {
00472                         std::ostringstream ss;
00473                         ss <<"Invalid " <<nbits <<"-bit register: \"" <<regname <<"\" is "
00474                            <<reg->get_nbits() <<" " <<(1==reg->get_nbits()?"byte":"bytes");
00475                         throw Exception(ss.str());
00476                     }
00477                     return *reg;
00478                 }
00479             };
